titleStmt.title: A bait for Momus a sermon preached long since in the towne of Bedford / by Tobias Bland.
titleStmt.author: Bland, Tobias, 1563?-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Raworth for Ioseph Hunscott, and are to be sold at his house in Crane-court, in the Old-change,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
